value:
$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_11_Laegjarn_FF_Pair,Face|It's time to show the world what my
Chilling Blades can do. The ninja
festival starts now!$k$p$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|Heh! You're quite taken with this
festival, aren't you?$k$p$nMPID_フィヨルム|Of course! You chose me as your
partner, and I can't let you down.$k$pThe tournament awaits us... It's time
to show them what we can do!$k$pAnd once we win, we—$k$p$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|Hm? What's the matter?$k$p$nMPID_フィヨルム|It's strange... I get the feeling that
we're being watched...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_FF_Pair,Face|It's faint, but yes... You there! Show
yourself!$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_DAMAGE0|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|Nothing gets past you. I thought I was
undetectable.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_11_Laegjarn_FF_Pair,Face|Princess Laevatein?$k$p$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|Laevatein... Why are you skulking
around like this?$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|I expected to pair up with you for the
festival.$k$pDo you intend to spend time with
Fjorm instead of me?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_11_Laegjarn_FF_Pair,Face|Oh...$k$p$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|Laevatein, listen. Festivals like this
offer chances to meet new people.
You could make a friend.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|I could? What? How could you say
that?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_11_Laegjarn_FF_Pair,Face|Princess Laevatein, wait! Oh, dear.
This is my fault.$k$p$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|Do not blame yourself. In some
respects, Laevatein can still
behave like a child.$k$pYou have my apologies. Please, put
it out of your mind.$k$p$nMPID_フィヨルム|Certainly... But is it really all right to
leave her be?$k$p$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|She will be fine. We, on the
other hand, must prepare for
the tournament. Come.$k$p$nMPID_フィヨルム|Very well.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_忍者ヒース,ch03_29_Heath_M_Ninja22,Face|I'm told that ninja are clandestine
operatives, careful to avoid the
eyes of their foes.$k$pThat sounds a little hard to pull off,
perched on a wyvern.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者ハール,ch11_14_Haar_M_Ninja22,Face|Y'ain't wrong. I think I'm going to
avoid prying eyes by stretching out
under a tree and taking a nap.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者セルジュ,ch04_18_Serge_F_Ninja22,Face|Minerva and I act as one. I could
never fulfill a role that required
us to act separately.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_忍者ヒース,ch03_29_Heath_M_Ninja22,Face|Damn, we lost... Does this mean
wyvern riders like us really aren't
cut out to be ninja?$k$p$Sbs150|
